I noticed 2 small errors on the character page.  Sunhawk is dead 
(basically) and shouldn't be there, and Hot Rod should be Rodimus 
Prime.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> LoL, ok. I wasn't sure which Rogues were being used right now when 
I 
> did the update, so I'll have to change than. I just guessed for the 
> most part. There was an order that they were supposed to be put up 
> in? *blinks* i can't tell that part, I just see that you've added a 
> character with a faction and a name. Kinda like this:
> 
> Rogue: Darigaaz/Devilcat.html
> 
> Then I add the second part there to the character page. You should 
> send me an email bout who is supposed to go where, and then i'll 
> change it. =)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Not to disparage your efforts or anything, but you fudged the 
> > starting Rogue roster, and Phoenix's link is broken (you 
> misspelled 
> > her name).  The Rogue list should have Gatara and Torin in place 
> of 
> > Devilcat and Lunara.  (Oh well, they'll come into things 
> eventually.)
> >
